divs: Sighting DetailsThe object was noticed in the early morning (approx. 5:31) of Sunday, June 23,2002. The location was the tiny community of Lacawanna Township, Pennslvania.The object was first noticed by two school age boys, camping out late at nightin their back yard. They noticed a floresent greenish-blue light over theneighbors house. At first glance the object appeared to hover at 400 to 500 feetinthe air and then about 3 minutes later shot straight into the air in anupwards direction,as if to go into the sky.After that the object disappearedwithin seconds. The total alotment of time that elapased between the time offirst sight and the time that the object shot into the sky was about 5 minutes.At the first sight the boys thougt it was a helacopter,however only secondslater realised it was something quite differrent since it was fairly lowflying,made absolutly no noise or sound what so ever and gave off the brightlight. In the moments of coming to this conclusion, the boys were stunned.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Sharon
There were no other sightings in Sharon on or around June 22nd 2002
